nodes.text: The Crafted Blight was the name given to the southwestern section of the Nightmare Lands on the planet Voss. It was the site of several ancient ruins, as well as where the entity Sel-Makor had some of the people under his control build strange structures that seemed to extend the edge of the Nightmare Lands' corruption.
The Crafted Blight appears as an area on Voss in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
